message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could come down to $180, which I feel is a fair price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $180 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
